name: Yosemite Falls Webcam
description: Features one of the tallest waterfalls in North America, with a total height of 2,425 feet. Provides a serene view of cascading water surrounded by pine trees and occasional wildlife like hawks or falcons.

name: Old Faithful Webcam
description: Captures the iconic geyser erupting approximately every 90 minutes, shooting water up to 185 feet. A symbol of geothermal activity and natural wonder.

name: Anhinga Trail Webcam
description: Streams wildlife activity in a sawgrass marsh, including alligators, turtles, and birds like egrets. Located at the Royal Palm Visitor Center.

name: Towers of the Virgin Webcam
description: Showcases stunning rock formations that change colors throughout the day due to light and shadow. Best viewed during sunrise for magical color displays.

name: Lake McDonald Webcam
description: Offers views of an alpine lake surrounded by snowcapped peaks and lush greenery. A peaceful introduction to Glacier National Park’s scenery.

name: Mauna Loa Webcam
description: Streams views of the island’s iconic volcano with occasional steam drifting from thermal areas. Highlights volcanic activity and natural beauty.

name: Bald Eagle Nest Cam
description: Focuses on bald eagles nesting on Santa Cruz Island. Viewers can watch nesting behaviors and fledglings in real-time.

name: Brooks Falls Bear Cam
description: Shows brown bears catching salmon during their spawning season. Provides an intimate look at bear behavior in their natural habitat.

name: OrcaLab Whale Cam
description: Streams orcas breaching and traveling along coastal waters. Promotes marine conservation by showcasing these intelligent predators in their ecosystem.

name: African Watering Hole Cam
description: Features elephants, buffalo, lions, and other wildlife gathering at a watering hole. Offers a glimpse into African wildlife interactions.

name: Dock Cam
description: Displays vibrant coral reefs, tropical fish schools, and occasional appearances by sharks at night. Highlights underwater biodiversity and marine ecosystems.

name: Anacapa Island Ocean Webcam
description: Captures kelp forests and diverse marine life swimming through turquoise waters. Rotates views for dynamic underwater scenes.

name: ISS Live Now
description: Provides a 24/7 live video feed of Earth from the International Space Station (ISS), orbiting 400 km above the planet. Includes multiple camera views such as HD Earth views, standard cameras showing ISS operations, NASA TV channels, and occasional spacewalk recordings.

name: NASA Official ISS Stream
description: Streams live video from external cameras on the ISS, showing Earth’s surface during daylight and city lights or lightning storms during nighttime. Occasionally switches to inside views of astronauts working aboard the station.

name: Sen’s 4K Livestream
description: Offers Ultra High Definition (4K) views of Earth and space captured by Sen's SpaceTV-1 cameras aboard the ISS. Streams over 20 hours daily, showcasing Earth's horizon, spacecraft arrivals/departures, and environmental monitoring.

name: Dream Trips ISS Livestream
description: A continuous feed from the ISS offering breathtaking views of Earth, including sunrises, sunsets, auroras, and glittering city lights. Includes glimpses of astronaut activities and occasional commentary on space phenomena.

name: AfarTV NASA Livestream
description: Streams live Earth views from NASA’s external HD cameras mounted on the ISS. Includes real-time data overlays such as global flight paths, lightning strikes, cloud conditions, and demographic statistics for locations beneath the ISS.
